DOC.brief_summary: This purpose of this study is to compare the safety and effectiveness of two approved drugs in the treatment of pain following bunionectomy surgery.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Two Approved Drugs in the Treatment of Post-Bunionectomy Surgery Pain (0966-234)(COMPLETED)
DOC.detailed_description: The duration of treatment is 5 days for rofecoxib and 1 day for diclofenac sodium.
DOC.criteria: Bunion removal Any known allergies to the study design
